problem.markdown:
>> Which of the following are advantages of data computation on a cluster? <<
( ) The ability to store data that can not otherwise fit in a single node's memory. ( ) The ability to localize computations on nodes that actually store the data, thus saving on communication cost and time. ( ) The ability to parallelize computations. (x) All of the above.

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following are advantages of data computation on a cluster?

choicegroup.choice: The ability to store data that can not otherwise fit in a single node's memory.
The ability to localize computations on nodes that actually store the data, thus saving on communication cost and time.
